title: Apprentice armor
summaries: Apprentice armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total after defeating any mechanical boss, and provides summon as well as magic damage bonuses. The set consists of the Apprentice's Hat, Apprentice's Robe, and Apprentice's Trousers.
A full set of Apprentice armor provides the following stats:

• +32 defense
  • +20% magic damage
  • +30% summon damage
  • +20% magic critical strike chance
  • âˆ’10% mana usage
  • +20% movement speed
  • +2 sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack range of <linked>Flameburst sentry summons</linked> by 50%, allowing them to attack up to 84 tiles away. It also increases their projectile <linked>velocity</linked> by 40% and increases their field of view significantly.
The <linked>Dark Artist armor</linked> can be considered a direct upgrade of the Apprentice armor.
